languages.text: "Почему ты согласилась примкнуть ко мне? Не странно ли для эльдара следовать за человеком?"
"Why did you agree to join me? Is it not strange for an Aeldari to be following a human?"
languages.original_text: "Почему ты согласилась примкнуть ко мне? Не странно ли для эльдара следовать за человеком?"

traits.locale_text: "Why did you agree to join me? Is it not strange for an Aeldari to be following a human?"
"Why did you agree to join me? Is it not strange for an Aeldari to be following a human?"
"Why did you agree to join me? Is it not strange for an Aeldari to be following a human?"
"Why did you agree to join me? Is it not strange for an Aeldari to be following a human?"
"Why did you agree to join me? Is it not strange for an Aeldari to be following a human?"

languages.text: “你为什么愿意加入我的队伍？艾达灵族听从人类的指挥，这不会显得很古怪吗？”
languages.original_text: "Why did you agree to join me? Is it not strange for an Aeldari to be following a human?"

traits.locale_text: “你为什么愿意加入我的队伍？艾达灵族听从人类的指挥，这不会显得很古怪吗？”

languages.text: «¿Por qué accedió a unirse a mí? ¿No es inusual que una Aeldari siga a un{mf||a} human{mf|o|a}?».
languages.original_text: "Why did you agree to join me? Is it not strange for an Aeldari to be following a human?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué accedió a unirse a mí? ¿No es inusual que una Aeldari siga a un{mf||a} human{mf|o|a}?».

languages.text: 「なぜ{mf|俺|私}と共に来ることに同意した？アエルダリが人間に従うのは奇妙じゃないか？」
languages.original_text: "Why did you agree to join me? Is it not strange for an Aeldari to be following a human?"

traits.locale_text: 「なぜ{mf|俺|私}と共に来ることに同意した？アエルダリが人間に従うのは奇妙じゃないか？」

languages.text: "Warum habt Ihr eingewilligt, Euch mir anzuschließen? Ist es nicht merkwürdig, dass ein Aeldari einem Menschen folgt?"
languages.original_text: "Why did you agree to join me? Is it not strange for an Aeldari to be following a human?"

traits.locale_text: "Warum habt Ihr eingewilligt, Euch mir anzuschließen? Ist es nicht merkwürdig, dass ein Aeldari einem Menschen folgt?"

languages.text: « Pourquoi avez-vous accepté de vous joindre à moi ? N'est-il pas étrange qu'une Aeldari suive {mf|un humain|une humaine} ? »
languages.original_text: "Why did you agree to join me? Is it not strange for an Aeldari to be following a human?"

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi avez-vous accepté de vous joindre à moi ? N'est-il pas étrange qu'une Aeldari suive {mf|un humain|une humaine} ? »

languages.text: "Bana katılmayı neden kabul ettin? Bir insanın izinden gitmek, Aeldariler için tuhaf değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "Why did you agree to join me? Is it not strange for an Aeldari to be following a human?"

traits.locale_text: "Bana katılmayı neden kabul ettin? Bir insanın izinden gitmek, Aeldariler için tuhaf değil mi?"
